content.query:
CREATE VIEW OrderHeader AS
select 
    SalesOrderID = JSON_VALUE(Body, '$.SalesOrderID'),
    OrderDate = JSON_VALUE(Body, '$.OrderDate'),
    Status = JSON_VALUE(Body, '$.Status'),
    SalesOrderNumber = JSON_VALUE(Body, '$.SalesOrderNumber'),
    PurchaseOrderNumber = JSON_VALUE(Body, '$.PurchaseOrderNumber'),
    AccountNumber = JSON_VALUE(Body, '$.AccountNumber'),
    CustomerID = JSON_VALUE(Body, '$.CustomerID'),
    SalesPersonID = JSON_VALUE(Body, '$.SalesPersonID'),
    CreditCardID = JSON_VALUE(Body, '$.CreditCardID'),
    CreditCardApprovalCode = JSON_VALUE(Body, '$.CreditCardApprovalCode'),
    TotalDue = JSON_VALUE(Body, '$.TotalDue'),
    rowguid = JSON_VALUE(Body, '$.rowguid'),
    ModifiedDate = JSON_VALUE(Body, '$.ModifiedDate')
from openrowset(
    bulk 'https://demostreamdatalake.dfs.core.windows.net/datalake/Raw/OrderHeader/Year=*/Month=*/Day=*/File=*/*.snappy.parquet',
    format = 'parquet')
 AS [r];
